interpretation: The "triangular flag" emoji is a symbol of warning and caution. It is a call to pay attention to potential hazards or obstacles on your path. This card may indicate that you need to proceed with caution and be aware of any red flags or warning signs in a situation. It can also represent the need to take a stand or assert yourself in a situation where boundaries have been crossed. This card reminds you to be vigilant and aware of your surroundings, and to trust your instincts when it comes to potential danger or risk. Associated keywords include warning, caution, boundary-setting, assertiveness, and vigilance.
